import useGetBugs from "../../helpers/hooks/useGetBugs" import { useAuthorize } from "../../helpers/hooks/useAuthorize" import Bug from "./Bug" import { Header } from "../index" const ViewBugs = () => { const bugs = useGetBugs() const isAuthorized = useAuthorize("manager/createprojects") return ( bugs && ( <>
) ) } export default ViewBugs
